name: Ruby Jerins
birth place: New York City, New York, USA
biography: Ruby Jerins was born on April 10, 1998 in New York City, New York, USA as Ruby Ulla Jerins. She is an actress, known for Shutter Island (2010), Nurse Jackie (2009) and Louder Than Bombs (2015).::Anonymous
trivia: Daughter of Artist Edgar Jerins and Actress Alana Jerins.
Awarded a Recanati-Kaplan Excellence in the Arts Scholarship, June 2007.
Attended LaGuardia Arts High School in New York City.
